text:
Are Sarah Silverman and Kate Beckinsale really writing a comedy series together? That’s the big news being reported in one of this week’s new tabloids, but Gossip Cop looked into the situation and we can exclusively reveal the truth. Silverman is dating Beckinsale’s ex Michael Sheen , with whom the actress shares an 18-year-old daughter, and […]
